text:
I'd like to send them, but I don't know the proper email address.
I don't like to copy the contents here :)
creator: tb@semestr.pl
tb@semestr.pl
text:
Created attachment 5255
That's the translation. I've found the possibility just now.

Thanks for the contribution, but some points:

- the appropriate place for such things is the documentation list:
docs@httpd.apache.org
- the entries in the error files are ordered alphabetically (for non-technical
reasons ;-)
- it seems, you're patching against an older version? I'm missing some
SSI-variable stuff (especially: CONTENT_LANGUAGE)
- last but not least: we require one native speaker for review. If you know one
(I believe, you do ;-) just invite him to participate the discussion and give us
his opinion.

Thanks!
creator: nd@perlig.de
jorton@redhat.com
